products.description: This box is full of delicious chocolate.
It might be more chocolate than you will ever need, but hey, no one's judging.
Amazing for winter, but also for summer. It's chocolate, it's always amazing.
It feels your heart with cocoa, because love is a bit bitter.

products.item: A small box containing two very fancy chocolats
products.description: It is expensive and we say we made it with the very best ingredients. You will look very rich when you eat it in front of everybody at work.
